page.title: 19SPORTS CENTRE 2
page.content: The percentages for the members are as follows:St Asaph 30% Denbigh 25%, Rhyl 16%,Ruthin 7.5%, Abergele 5% and the other 16.5% from other surrounding areas. The prices for the use of facilities is as follows: Membership Fees; Adults Â£2.75 Juniors Â£0.85 Family Â£5.50 (parents and children) Here are some examples of prices: main hall per hour Â£6.20,badminton per hour Â£1.55,grass pitch(per match) Â£6.75, gymnasium per hour Â£3.90,all weather pitch per hour Â£4.40 The opening hours for the sports centre are:during school term, weekdays:5.00pm to 10.30pm,and out of school term:10.00am to 10.00pm,and at weekends:10.00am to 8.30pm
